Question: Dongguan T.Top Printing Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan T.TOP Printing Co., Ltd.

Product: Handmade gift box, Color box, Carton box, Paper house

- Founded in 2000, covering about 13,000 square meters
- Leading products include Paper bag, Plastic bag, Paper box, Color Box, Handmade Gift Box, Color trademark, Wedding invitation cards, Christmas greeting cards, Corrugated board, and carton
- Equipped with printing machines exported from Germany
- Passed ISO9001:2000 International Quality Management System authentication
- Implements ISO9001, ISO14001:2004 Environment System, and OHSAS18000:2007 Occupational Health and Safety Assessment Series
- Offers high-quality products and services
- Focuses on digital transformation, integrated innovation, intelligent manufacturing, and green development
